trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Port Orange
There were no other sightings in Port Orange on or around January 15th 2011
divs: sighting detailswalking on sidewalk on boggsford road just happened to look up at the morning sky i observed a star like object with red and orange running lights. not a cloud in the sky neither the moon or the sun or aircraft was visible. it was motionless. from 630 am to 715 am. i saw it as i looked south. every now and then i get glimpse of the object amongst the clouds. i was excited and wanted to see more. so i continued on the sidewalk and ended up at the dead end of kendrew and bogssford road. between the trees and the woods i continued to observe a glowing object. then the clouds covered it. i have documented the 45 minute walk on my tape recorder. if any one would like to get a copy please remit *(email address deleted--cms\sg).
Summary: walking on sidewalk on Bogsford road just happened to look up at the sky I observed a start like object with red and green running lights. Not a cloud in the sky neither the moon or the sun or aircraft was visible. It was motionless. from 630 am to 715 am
